tool_description: Calculates shipping costs and delivery times from warehouses to delivery locations using various carriers and service levels.

package_dimensions.description: Package dimensions as [length, width, height] in inches

service_levels.description: Desired service levels: ground, express, overnight

error_messages: Invalid warehouse ID: One or more warehouse identifiers are not recognized.
Invalid zip code: Destination zip code must be a valid US postal code.
Invalid weight: Package weight must be a positive number up to 150 pounds.
Invalid dimensions: All dimensions must be positive numbers, maximum 108 inches per side.
Invalid service level: Must be one of: ground, express, overnight.
Invalid carrier: Must be one of: fedex, ups, usps.
Shipping rates unavailable: Unable to retrieve current shipping rates from carriers.
usage: Provide origin_warehouse_ids, destination_zip, package_weight, and package_dimensions. Optionally specify service_levels, carriers, and declared_value for customized rate calculations.

cost_range.description: Cost range across all options in format 'min_cost-max_cost'
